sentences.en: Animated tourists can scrutinize artifacts and scenes including " The Emperor Having Dinner. "
sentences.cn: 虚拟故宫访问者可以欣赏宫中藏品并观看皇宫里各种生活场景,如 “ 皇帝用膳 ” 等.

sentences.en: Her purpose was to scrutinize his features to see if he was an honest man.
sentences.cn: 她的目的是通过仔细观察他的相貌以判断他是否诚实。

sentences.en: Ideological work in college must scrutinize the fact from the height of strategy and take measures.
sentences.cn: 高校思想政治工作必须从战略的高度审视这一现实,必须有所作为.

sentences.en: MPs may lack the necessary expertise to scrutinize legislation effectively.
sentences.cn: 议员可能缺乏严格审查立法所必备的专业知识。

sentences.en: Scrutinize every word, memorize every line.
sentences.cn: 仔细观察每个词, 记住每行字.

sentences.en: Scrutinize ourselves with a sense of shame, but view the world with a sense of gratitude.
sentences.cn: 用惭愧心看自己,用感恩心看世界.

sentences.en: Selden had retained her hand, and continued to scrutinize her with a strange sense of foreboding.
sentences.cn: 赛尔登一直紧握着她的手, 用预感到大祸临头的惊恐目光仔细观察她.

sentences.en: She leaned forward to scrutinize their faces.
sentences.cn: 她探身向前，端详他们的面容。

sentences.en: Suddenly these cliches are scientific questions, as researchers scrutinize the power of positive thinking.
sentences.cn: 当研究者仔细观察积极思维的作用时,这些陈词滥调突然间都成了科学问题.

sentences.en: The officer at MOL will vet and scrutinize the documents.
sentences.cn: 军官在注塑及细究这个文件将兽医.

sentences.en: They study my report card the same way they scrutinize the newspaper's stock market page.
sentences.cn: 他们审查我的成绩报告,就像仔细看报纸上的股票市场版一样认真.
我们必须细细察看并做出评价.

sentences.en: We scrutinize the crime scene, collect the evidence recreate what happened without ever having been there.
sentences.cn: 我们仔细检查犯罪现场, 收集证据并重建犯罪过程.
我们仔细观察犯罪现场.

sentences.en: You'll also scrutinize how you spend money.
sentences.cn: 你也会详审自己是怎么花钱的.

words.tran_cn: 详细审查；监视；细看；选票复查
细看；仔细观察或检查；核对（等于scrutinize）

trans.tran_en: to examine someone or something very carefully
